help.title: **YAKO GUARDIAN - HELP**
help.welcome: Welcome to the interactive help panel.

category.administration:
__**âš–ï¸ Administration**__

`{{prefix}}backup <create/load/list/delete> [name]` - *Backup System*
`{{prefix}}unbanall` - *Unban all users*
`{{prefix}}autobackup <on/off>` - *Auto Backups*
`{{prefix}}renew` - *Renewal*
`{{prefix}}sync` - *Synchronization*
`{{prefix}}discussion` - *Interactive session*
category.antiraid:
__**ğŸ›¡ï¸ Anti-Raid**__

`{{prefix}}secur <on/off>` - *Toggle security*
`{{prefix}}antitoken <on/off/lock>` - *Manage anti-token*
`{{prefix}}raidlog <on/off> [channel]` - *Toggle raid logs*
`{{prefix}}raidping <@role>` - *Set raid ping role*
`{{prefix}}punition <antiraid/all> <derank/kick/ban>` - *Set punishment*
category.configuration:
__**âš™ï¸ Configuration**__

`{{prefix}}config` - *Show current configuration*
`{{prefix}}set <type> <value>` - *Modify an option*
`{{prefix}}remove <perm/activity>` - *Remove config*
`{{prefix}}prefix <new>` - *Change bot prefix*
`{{prefix}}lang <fr/en/custom>` - *Change bot language*
`{{prefix}}helptype <button/select/hybrid>` - *Change help menu style*
`{{prefix}}perms <set/del/reset>` - *Manage permission levels*
`{{prefix}}wl <add/remove/list>` - *Manage whitelist*
`{{prefix}}blrank <on/off>` - *Manage blacklist rank*
`{{prefix}}theme <#HexColor>` - *Change embed color*
`{{prefix}}creation limit <time>` - *Limit account creation*
`{{prefix}}alias <add/remove>` - *Manage aliases*
`{{prefix}}activity <type> <txt>` - *Activity*
`{{prefix}}stream <txt>` - *Stream Status*
`{{prefix}}clearperms` - *Reset permissions*
`{{prefix}}change <cmd> <perm>` - *Manage command permissions*
`{{prefix}}compet <text>` - *Activity Competing*
`{{prefix}}dnd` - *Status DND*
`{{prefix}}idle` - *Status Idle*
`{{prefix}}invisible` - *Status Invisible*
`{{prefix}}online` - *Status Online*
`{{prefix}}listen <text>` - *Activity Listening*
`{{prefix}}playto <text>` - *Activity Playing*
`{{prefix}}watch <text>` - *Activity Watching*
category.custom:
__**ğŸ¨ Custom Commands**__

`{{prefix}}custom <name> <response>` - *Create command*
`{{prefix}}autoreact <add/remove> <emoji>` - *Auto reaction*
`{{prefix}}button <text>` - *Create button*
`{{prefix}}clearcustoms` - *Clear all*
`{{prefix}}customlist` - *List commands*
category.owner:
__**ğŸ‘‘ Owner**__

`{{prefix}}owner <add/remove> <user>` - *Manage owners*
`{{prefix}}genkey <duration>` - *Generate key*
`{{prefix}}servers` - *Server list*
`{{prefix}}leave` - *Leave server*
`{{prefix}}mp <user> <message>` - *DM member*
`{{prefix}}bl <user>` - *Global blacklist*
`{{prefix}}invite` - *Invite bot*
`{{prefix}}reset` - *Reset server*
`{{prefix}}update` - *Update*
`{{prefix}}globalset <opt> <val>` - *Global config*
category.roles:
__**ğŸ­ Roles**__

`{{prefix}}massiverole <add/remove> <role>` - *Massive role*
`{{prefix}}unmassiverole <role>` - *Undo massive role*
`{{prefix}}temprole <user> <role> <time>` - *Temp role*
`{{prefix}}untemprole <user> <role>` - *Remove temp role*
`{{prefix}}rolemenu` - *Role menu*
`{{prefix}}soutien` - *Support role*
`{{prefix}}restrict` - *Restriction*
`{{prefix}}unrestrict <option>` - *Remove restriction*
category.tickets:
__**ğŸ« Tickets**__

`{{prefix}}ticket <create/close/add/remove>` - *Ticket panel*
`{{prefix}}add <user>` - *Add member*
`{{prefix}}remove <user>` - *Remove member*
`{{prefix}}close` - *Close ticket*
`{{prefix}}rename <name>` - *Rename ticket*
`{{prefix}}claim` - *Claim ticket*
`{{prefix}}del` - *Delete ticket*
category.utils:
__**ğŸ› ï¸ Utils**__

`{{prefix}}serverinfo` - *Server info*
`{{prefix}}member <user>` - *Member info*
`{{prefix}}user <user>` - *User info*
`{{prefix}}role <role>` - *Role info*
`{{prefix}}pic <user>` - *Avatar*
`{{prefix}}banner <user>` - *Banner*
`{{prefix}}snipe` - *Deleted message*
`{{prefix}}say <message>` - *Say*
`{{prefix}}embed` - *Embed creator*
`{{prefix}}calc <calc>` - *Calculator*
`{{prefix}}reminder <time> <message>` - *Reminder*
`{{prefix}}wiki <search>` - *Wiki search*
`{{prefix}}create <emoji>` - *Create emoji*
`{{prefix}}alladmins` - *List admins*
`{{prefix}}allbots` - *List bots*
`{{prefix}}boosters` - *List boosters*
`{{prefix}}channel <channel>` - *Channel info*
`{{prefix}}rolemembers <role>` - *Role members*
`{{prefix}}vocinfo` - *Voice info*
`{{prefix}}botadmins` - *List bot admins*
`{{prefix}}changelogs` - *Update logs*
`{{prefix}}emoji <emoji>` - *Emoji info*
`{{prefix}}image <query>` - *Image search*
`{{prefix}}lb suggestions` - *Leaderboard*
`{{prefix}}loading <time>` - *Test loading*
`{{prefix}}newsticker` - *New sticker*
`{{prefix}}search wiki` - *Wiki search*
`{{prefix}}yako` - *Support*
